title: Save Arabella
content:
near X-147, Y769).

How to unlock Save Arabella

Save Arabella Rewards

Cherished Locket

Save Arabella Related Backgrounds

The following Backgrounds are related to this Quest:

If you Save Arabella from Kagha and her serpent you will complete one of objectives for the Urchin background called Not on My Watch.

Save Arabella Notes & Tips

Saving Arabella make it easier to befriend Mol, who can be found in Tiefling Hideout. If you saved her in Act 1, you can recruit her to your camp at Rethiwin
